name: The Palms Oceanfront Suites

reviews.text: The Palms is a terrific, comfortable, really well-kept place. It was very clean and comfortable and spacious. They give you complimentary 5 gallons of bottled water and the kitchen was well equipped. We had an incredible ocean view and the hotel is right on the ocean. The pool is a little small and tucked in the back, but it's good for just dipping in. The staff keeps the grounds up meticulously. They also sent someone over to pick us up from the airport in a golf cart, which was really handy, because even though it's only a half block away, the streets are cobbled and it would have been a little harder to walk it with luggage. We were a little worried about the proximity to the airport, but although you can hear some planes (they are small), noise was never a problem.
reviews.title: Terrific place to stay

reviews.text: The hotel doesn't have a bar or restaurant, but it's super close to a ton of bars and restaurants on the beach and in town. Everything is in walking distance.
reviews.title: Family or couples

reviews.text: Ambergris Caye was lovely. The only thing you need to be careful about is asking if prices are in Belizean dollars or USD if it isn't clear. My friend got a massage at a spa in the hotel next door, and the price written down was $80. She assumed that since we were in Belize, that the prices were in Belizean dollars. However, after the massage, the masseuse told her the price was USD, which seems pretty disingenuous. However, just ask if you're not clear about it. Everywhere else, people were very nice and honest.
reviews.title: Great stay at The Palms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would definitely stay there again. It's close to all the local bars and restaurants; everything is in walking distance. Everyone at the Palms was friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Great location, spacious comfortable suite

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Palms is a lovely small community within steps of the ocean, pool, restaurants, shopping and town. The staff are friendly and accommodating. I have traveled to Belize 3 times- twice I stayed at the Palms and once norh on the island, the Palms by far is best! I have traveled thete with fruends as a couple and with my little ones. Even in the heart if things it is quiet yet convenient. La isla Bonita!!
reviews.title: Loved our stay in the Casita at The Palms

aka: The Palms Oceanfront Hotel San Pedro
description: The Palms is ideally located on the beach a minutes walk south of San Pedro Town. The property features 12 oceanfront 1 and 2 bedroom fully furnished suites and a poolside Casita. All the units are individually decorated, have a/c, full kitchens and have unmatched ocean views.
